attributes.action: HELP PEOPLE IN YEMEN BEFORE IT’S TOO LATE.
attributes.additional_details: We would like this to happen so that people in Yemen can be treated and can live the life they deserve instead of starving to death without the help of other countries. The activities going on in Yemen right now are in humane, many children are dying because they are malnourished. It’s heartbreaking, and the worst part is that no one is raising awareness: no news articles, radios or big news outlets like the BBC. Please, please help Yemen we may be their only hope.
attributes.background: We would like the government to arrange  food, water , and health care to be sent over to Yemen. In hopes of decreeing the amount of people dying and stopping Yemen from going extinct. In addition to urge the Uk to stop selling arms to Saudi Arabia.
